.hw   ga'- < >
df   *animal classifier, *pet
il   Dankolo i ga'-$na katu si Maria. |Maria's cat (her pet animal) is
  big
.hw   ga'- < >
df   *prefer, *like--prefix showing strong desire
cf   ga'$na
il   Ga'chotda hao. |You really like bananas
il   Ga'bumola si Perez. |Perez loves to play ball
il   Ga'salape' si Calvo. |Calvo loves money

  something to wilt from heat

il   Hu ha'me i flores. |I made the flower wilt from the heat

  a ball

  was good

wc   2
df   *fascination, attraction
